Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Messages from Koreans under Mindan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Congratulatory Messages from Koreans under Mindan 
    Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received congratulatory messages from Mindan-lining compatriots living in various regions of Japan including Kyoto and Saitama and south Koreans staying in Japan on the New Year Juche 94 (2005).
 The messages highly praise the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il for national reunification, saying he was wisely leading all the fellow countrymen to the implementation of the historic June 15 joint declaration, having opened a turning phase for national reunification by setting up a milestone with the declaration.    
 The messages express the firm resolution of the compatriots to participate enthusiastically in the nation-wide struggle to turn this year, the historic year in which fall the 5th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 60th anniversary of national liberation, into the year of independent reunification with united strength of the nation.
